text: malavun keren nægituvanu labana dinaya dakva ovunata erehi va napuru danduvamen danduvam karana aya evanu ætæyi numbage paramadhipati nivedanaya kala avasthava sihipat karanu. niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipati danduvam dimehi ita vegavatya. tavada niyata vasayenma ohu ati ksamasili karuna gunayen yuktaya
